i have xna 4 and framework 4 installed. nothing works. a lot of people have problems with this game.

That's usually a .NET framework error.

Try reinstalling it if you already have it.

I also got the framework error,  and after reading your comment on downloading the "junk" and installing it,  i was pretty sure it would still fail.

But nope,  works like a charm now,  props to you sir,  and thanks for the upload.
